typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> src01customer
src01customer select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID = Column_1,
		PersonID = Column_2,
		StoreID = Column_3,
		TerritoryID = Column_4,
		AccountNumber = Column_5,
		rowguid = Column_6,
		ModifiedDate = Column_7
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> slc02customer
slc02customer sink(input(
		CustomerID as integer,
		PersonID as integer,
		StoreID as integer,
		TerritoryID as integer,
		AccountNumber as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		TerritoryID
	)) ~> sk03customer
